allowance(address,address).details: Get the number of tokens `spender` is approved to spend on behalf of `account`

params.account: The address of the account holding the funds
params.spender: The address of the account spending the funds

approve(address,uint256).details: Approve `spender` to transfer up to `amount` from `src` This will overwrite the approval amount for `spender`  and is subject to issues noted [here](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-20#approve)

params.rawAmount: The number of tokens that are approved (2^256-1 means infinite)
params.spender: The address of the account which may transfer tokens

returns._0: Whether or not the approval succeeded

balanceOf(address).details: Get the number of tokens held by the `account`

params.account: The address of the account to get the balance of

cumulativeDividendsOf(address).details: accumulativeFundsOf(account) = withdrawableDividendsOf(account) + withdrawnDividendsOf(account) = (pointsPerShare * balanceOf(account) + pointsCorrection[account]) / POINTS_MULTIPLIER

params.account: The address of a token holder.

returns._0: The amount of dividends that `account` has earned in total.

params.delegatee: The address to delegate votes to
The address to delegate votes to
params.expiry: The time at which to expire the signature
params.nonce: The contract state required to match the signature
params.r: Half of the ECDSA signature pair
params.s: Half of the ECDSA signature pair
params.v: The recovery byte of the signature

getCurrentVotes(address).details: Gets the current votes balance for `account`

params.account: The address to get votes balance

returns._0: The number of current votes for `account`

getPriorVotes(address,uint256).details: Determine the prior number of votes for an account as of a block number Block number must be a finalized block or else this function will revert to prevent misinformation.

params.account: The address of the account to check
params.blockNumber: The block number to get the vote balance at

returns._0: The number of votes the account had as of the given block

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.dst: The address of the destination account
params.rawAmount: The number of tokens to transfer

returns._0: Whether or not the transfer succeeded

params.dst: The address of the destination account
params.rawAmount: The number of tokens to transfer
params.src: The address of the source account

returns._0: Whether or not the transfer succeeded

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawableDividendsOf(address).details: Returns the total amount of dividends a given address is able to withdraw.

returns._0: A uint256 representing the dividends `account` can withdraw

params.account: The address of a token holder.

returns._0: The amount of dividends that `account` has withdrawn.

cumulativeDividendsOf(address).notice: View the amount of dividends that an address has earned in total.

withdrawnDividendsOf(address).notice: View the amount of dividends that an address has withdrawn.
